messages.title: In many areas it's a two horse race between the Lib Dems and the Tories
messages.content: In many parts of Britain, Labour just can't win and are in a poor third place. In areas like this, the choice is between a Lib Dem MP or a Conservative MP. Voting Labour or staying at home could just help elect a Conservative MP.

messages.title: Don't lose your vote!
messages.content: We don't always know what will happen to us tomorrow, let alone on polling day. Sometimes we just can't make it to vote. The result could be close in many areas - a few votes in your seat could make all the difference. Don't miss your chance to vote for a real change for Britain.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Delivering fairer taxes, better schools and protect our NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Every extra vote for the Liberal Democrats will deliver fairer taxes, better schools and protect our NHS. Only the Lib Dems will deliver change that works for you.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many areas it's a two horse race between the Lib Dems and the Tories

issues.economy: Every extra vote for the Liberal Democrats will deliver fairer taxes
issues.education: Every extra vote for the Liberal Democrats will deliver...better schools
issues.health: Every extra vote for the Liberal Democrats will...protect our NHS

images.caption: In many areas it's a two horse race between the Lib Dems and the Tories

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet prompts to ACT using The Lib Dem Network and to not miss the chance for a postal vote, suggesting importance of participation.
